```{r}
ggplot(dsd, aes(TS.mn, e.rel.150)) + 
  geom_text(aes(label = trial.ID)) +
  theme_bw() +
  ylab(expression(paste(NH[3],' (% of TAN)'))) +
  xlab('Dry matter (%)') +
  theme(legend.position = 'bottom', legend.title = element_blank())
```
